title: Jo Stevens – 2021 Comments on Football Ticket Prices
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jo Stevens, the Shadow Secretary of State for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport, on 10 July 2021.
content:
England’s success in this tournament has made us all proud and shown again how much joy football can bring.
